summary: Email correspondence between an Assistant United States Attorney and another individual regarding voicemail tips received about Jeffrey Epstein. The AUSA forwards the tips for investigation and inquires about the timing of an interview scheduled for that day.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: Forwards voicemail tips about Epstein to be handled by the FBI tip line and asks for an update on an interview scheduled for August 29, 2019.

events.title: Scheduled Interview
events.description: An interview is scheduled to take place, with the AUSA inquiring about its timing.
personsInvolved: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated August 29, 2019, concerning the Epstein investigation.
An Assistant U.S. Attorney forwards voicemail tips about Epstein that they believe have investigative value.
The AUSA requests that the tips be handled by or passed to whoever is managing the FBI tip line.
The AUSA separately asks for an update on the timing of an interview scheduled for that day.
The document indicates active tip collection and investigative coordination shortly after Epstein's death in August 2019.
